caption.p: Broad-scale patterns of RSV are correlated with local climate. a Incidence time series for each county (USA) and state (Mexico) in the dataset. b Timing of onset (color) and dynamic pattern (shape) of each location in the dataset. c Example incidence time series for four location exhibiting distinct dynamic patterns. d Correlation between timing of epidemic onset and mean climate conditions (averages over temporal range of data). e Spatial correlation between RSV time series.
